about_the_game:
Roll the dice and fight for survival.

Prepare for the ultimate challenge in Dice of Souls, an action-packed game where you must battle through perilous dungeons filled with traps and monsters, culminating in epic boss battles that will test your skills to the limit.

As a fearless dwarf warrior armed with a massive dice weapon, you must fight for survival and emerge as the ultimate survivor. Forge walls of dice, imbue them with magic runes, and adorn them with precious stones to enhance their power and customize your weapon to your liking.

Uncover the captivating story behind the creation of your formidable dice weapon and become the hero who triumphs against all odds. Experience an immersive storyline full of surprises and challenging boss battles.

With stunning graphics and immersive sound design, Dice of Souls is the ultimate test of your skills and courage. Are you ready to roll the Dice of Souls?
